impact_in_millions.fr: L'incidence sur les recettes est exprimée en millions de dollars

total_increase.en: Your changes would *decrease expenses* by :absbalance million, or :percent of total revenues.
total_increase.fr: Vos modifications *réduiraient les dépenses* de :absbalance millions de dollars, ou :percent des recettes totales.

total_decrease.en: Your changes would *increase expenses* by :absbalance million, or :percent of total revenues.
total_decrease.fr: Vos modifications *augmenteraient les dépenses* de :absbalance millions de dollars, ou :percent des recettes totales.
